Package com.lamzone.mareu.repository

Class MeetingRepository

java.lang.Object
com.lamzone.mareu.repository.MeetingRepository
public class MeetingRepository extends Object
The MeetingRepository class manages access to meeting data.

    • filterMeetings

      public List<Meeting> filterMeetings(List<Meeting> meetings, boolean filterByDate, boolean filterByLocation, String selectedLocation, Calendar selectedDate)
      Filters meetings based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      meetings - Full list of meetings.
      filterByDate - Indicates if filtering by date is enabled.
      filterByLocation - Indicates if filtering by location is enabled.
      selectedLocation - Selected location for filtering.
      selectedDate - Selected date for filtering.
      Returns:
      Filtered list of meetings.
